text.value: The following list contains four of Hamlet’s true attributes but also an attribute which is not strictly true. Identify the odd one out –

value.value: an affinity for actors, perhaps, but he’s not one of the ‘players’
certainly not married to Ophelia – even if Gertrude likes the idea
who likes to get all the attention and might be a teeny bit spoiled
“the expectation and rose of the fair state” as Ophelia calls him
intellectually lively – his alma mater is the University of Wittenberg
